item.title: Kristen Kish on Finding Her Confidence Hosting ‘Top Chef,’ Her Least Favorite Food and Agreeing to Do ‘The Traitors’: ‘It Was a Business Decision’
item.description: “Top Chef” host and chef Kristen Kish has eaten her fair share of culinary delights, but there’s one dish she’s not a fan of: smoked salmon. “You could probably pay me, because if I’m on ‘Top Chef ’ a
